title: Apportionment of business income; percentage
context: ยง235-29 Apportionment of business income; percentage. All business income shall be apportioned to this State by multiplying the income by a fraction, the numerator of which is the property factor plus the payroll factor plus the sales factor, and the denominator of which is three. [L 1967, c 33, pt of ยง1; HRS ยง235-29]
